:py:mod:`depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation`
=============================================

.. py:module:: depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Mutation operators for DepotPrototype.



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mutgaussian_area_count_crop
   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mutgaussian_area_count_rnd
   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mutuniform_area_count_crop
   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mutuniform_area_count_rnd
   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mutgaussian_area_capacity
   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mutuniform_area_capacity
   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mut_area_to_other_type
   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mut_combine_two_areas
   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mutgaussian_depot_and
   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mutgaussian_depot_or_partial
   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mutgaussian_depot_or
   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mutuniform_depot_or_partial
   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mutuniform_depot_or



Attributes
~~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   depot.layout_opt.opt_tools.mutation.mutations


.. py:data:: mutations
   :value: []

   

.. py:function:: mutgaussian_area_count_crop(depot, mu, sigma)

   Random gaussian mutation of area count.
   If less than before, the area list is cropped on the right. If higher than
   before, new areas with random init values are appended to the right.


.. py:function:: mutgaussian_area_count_rnd(depot, mu, sigma)

   Random gaussian mutation of area count.
   If less than before, random areas are removed. If higher than before, new
   areas with random capacities are appended to the right.


.. py:function:: mutuniform_area_count_crop(depot, a, b)

   Random uniform mutation of area count.
   If less than before, the area list is cropped on the right. If higher than
   before, new areas with random init values are appended to the right.


.. py:function:: mutuniform_area_count_rnd(depot, a, b)

   Random uniform mutation of area count.
   If less than before, the area list is cropped on the right. If higher than
   before, new areas with random init values are appended to the right.


.. py:function:: mutgaussian_area_capacity(area, mu, sigma)

   Random gaussian mutation of area capacity.


.. py:function:: mutuniform_area_capacity(area, a, b)

   Random uniform mutation of area capacity.


.. py:function:: mut_area_to_other_type(area, depot)

   Select a random area and convert it to one or more areas of another
   type, keeping the capacity.


.. py:function:: mut_combine_two_areas(depot)

   Select two random areas and try to combine them.


.. py:function:: mutgaussian_depot_and(depot, mutsigma_area_count, mutpb_area_count, mutpb_area_type, mutsigma_area_capacity, mutpb_area_capacity)

   Wrapper for mutations of a depot individual where area count, type and
   capacity might be mutated.


.. py:function:: mutgaussian_depot_or_partial(depot, mutsigma_area_count, mutpb_area_count, mutpb_area_type, mutsigma_area_capacity, mutpb_area_capacity)

   Wrapper for mutations of a depot individual where area count and either
   type or capacity might be mutated.


.. py:function:: mutgaussian_depot_or(depot, mutsigma_area_count, mutpb_area_count, mutpb_area_type, mutsigma_area_capacity, mutpb_area_capacity, splitpb)

   Wrapper for mutations of a depot individual where either area count or
   type or capacity of one area might be mutated.


.. py:function:: mutuniform_depot_or_partial(depot, a_area_count, b_a_area_count, mutpb_area_count, mutpb_area_type, a_area_capacity, b_area_capacity, mutpb_area_capacity)

   Wrapper for mutations of a depot individual where area count and either
   type or capacity might be mutated.


.. py:function:: mutuniform_depot_or(depot, a_area_count, b_a_area_count, mutpb_area_count, mutpb_area_type, a_area_capacity, b_area_capacity, mutpb_area_capacity)

   Wrapper for mutations of a depot individual where area count and either
   type or capacity might be mutated.
